attributes.action: Force Car insurance companies to operate in Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Drivers in Northern Ireland are being unfairly treated by Car Insurance Companies in Mainland UK. They offer great discounts to everyone except N.Ireland residents yet they are still allowed to advertise on the channels we receive. They should be forced to be unbiased and operate fully in Northern Ireland and base our prices the same as Mainland UK
